title: 1/BD, Easy access to the 405 Freeway, Separate dining area
posting_body: ['Bedrooms:', '1', 'Bathrooms:', '1', 'Square Feet:', '792', 'Address:', '9423 Reseda Boulevard', 'Welcome to Meridian Place Apartment Homes, where we collaborate with our residents to redefine apartment living.', 'Our vibrant community, located in the heart of Northridge, CA, offers an exciting and engaging lifestyle with first-class amenities in our renovated apartments.', 'Each one of our pet friendly one and two bedroom apartments comes fully equipped with energy-efficient appliances, granite countertops, 9-foot high ceilings, private balconies, in-home washer and dryer, and much more.', 'Amenities Include:', 'Easy access to the 405 Freeway', 'Built-in linen closet', 'Media room for resident activities and private screenings', 'Private balcony or patio                                                                                        Featured amenity', 'Separate dining area', 'Onsite retail with convenient shopping right at your doorstep                                                                                         Featured amenity', 'State-of-the-art fitness center                                                                                         Featured amenity', 'In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity', 'Relaxing resort-style pool with sun deck and spa                                                                                         Featured amenity', 'Elevator access', 'Resident social lounge', 'Oversized walk-in closets', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing OpportunityPrices Change DailyFlexible Lease Terms']
